data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Xilin Gol, Nei Mongol, China to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xilin Gol, Nei Mongol, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Xilin Gol, Nei Mongol, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.section_summary: On average, 47 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Xilin Gol, Nei Mongol, China.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, guide the church in Xilin Gol, Nei Mongol, China to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 627,800 people living in the county of Xilin Gol.
Lord, remember the Mongol, Khalka people. Make the Mongol, Khalka people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Xilin Gol.
Father, please give the people in the county of Xilin Gol access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary:
the county of Xilin Gol, Nei Mongol, China has a population of 627,800.

We estimate Xilin Gol has 47,626 people who might know Jesus, 10,142 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 570,032 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 47,626 believers in the county of Xilin Gol into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;
